sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' export default function About() { const[myStyle, setMyStyle] = useState({ color: 'black', backgroundColor: 'white' }) const [btntext, setBtnText] = useState("Enable dark mode") const toogleStyle = () => { if (myStyle.color === "white") { setMyStyle({ color: "black", backgroundColor: "white", border: '4px solid white' }) setBtnText("Enable dark mode") } else{ setMyStyle({ color: "white", backgroundColor: "black", }) setBtnText("Enable light mode") } } return ( <>

about us

This is the first item's accordion body. It is shown by default

This is the second item's accordion body. It is hidden by default
) }
